Short dress in a crêpe weave with an open section at the front and a V-neck with a tie detail. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Skirt in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and a glittery stripe down each side.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with frills around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves and an elasticated seam and bow at the waist.
Longer top in soft, patterned fleece with long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Drawstring hood with wide, shiny ribbons, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.

Set with a dress and leggings. Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Braided imitation suede belt. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Longer-style top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Nightshirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the front, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and an adjustable belt with a plastic buckle at the front. Pleats at the top, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide, ankle-length legs with creases.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable, braided belt at the waist. Unlined.

Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front. Appliqués on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
